# DocQA-MS Frontend Workspace Setup

## Project: InterfaceClinique - Modern Medical Document Q&A Interface

- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.

	**COMPLETED**: Creating React TypeScript application with Vite, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, Auth0, Chart.js, React Query, Zustand for state management. Medical document interface with upload, search, Q&A chat, analytics dashboard.
